'''Harry Adkins''' is the father of [[Winnie Adkins]].

==History==
Harry was having coffee a block away from his home with his wife, Carolyn, when their apartment building collapsed. Their daughter, Winnie, was injured, so they drove her to the hospital. After Winnie was taken into surgery, they learned that their landlord, [[Micah (You Haven't Done Nothin')|Micah]], knew the building wasn't sound, angering them. Harry swore his revenge, along with several of the other tenants. When they learned Winnie had died, Carolyn went to the ICU and tried to kill Micah herself by disconnecting his vent. She was restrained and then arrested.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Carolyn Adkins]].

===Familial===
He was devastated when his daughter, Winnie, died.
